title: Women's Crewneck Sequin Shift Dress Short Sleeve Casual Holiday Sparkly Party Dress
description: Material: 100%Polyester, it's lined and not see through.
Features: Sequin Party Dress, Roundneck Casual Glitter Dress, Relaxed Fit, Short Sleeve, Colorful Sequins Embroidered .
If you are looking for some casual sparkly sequin dress, it is, easy to dress up and the relaxed fit give you enough room to hide belly.
Gorgeous dress for coming holiday season, it's perfect for party, cocktail, photo shooting, family gathering, etc.
US Size: Small 0-4, Medium 6-8, Large 10-12, X-Large 14-16, XX-Large 18-20. Runs true to Size, no need to size up.
